extendedInfo.description: Ping Pong HD game is a modern version of a classic arcade video games, popular in the 70s. It is a tennis sports game featuring simple two-dimensional graphics. Goal of the game is to defeat your opponent earning a higher score.Ping Pong HD is a simple, free, fun and addictive game for 1 or 2 players. You can play as single player against Android or play with your friends or relatives or just play your left hand finger against your right hand finger. Kids and people of all ages love playing Ping Pong HD app! Try it for yourself and you will love it!Ping Pong app offers:- single and two player mode â play against Android or against another human or play your left hand finger against your right hand finger- 3 different levels in single player mode; easy, medium, hard- game statistics- simple design that looks great on all android devices and display sizes, including tablets- retro sound effects - small size, less than 0.5MB!- new game starts automatically for more fun and faster playing- hours of fun for you, your kids, friends and relatives- perfect for wasting time while on the way to school or work- kids love it and keeps them occupied for hours!Ping Pong game is also called Ping-pong, Table tennis, computer tennis, retro table tennis, retro ping pong.Our mission at Classic Games is to bring the best classic, timeless games to Android devices, for free, with the best design, highest quality of professional programming, smallest size and much much more in order to ensure the best playing experience and endless hours of fun playing alone or with your friends, relatives and loved ones. Please send us an email telling us about games you miss playing, the ones you played for days when you were a kid and we will bring them back to life for your Android device.

reviews.title: BY JAI.Z
reviews.comment: THE FIRST FEW MINUTES OF PLAYING THIS GAME WAS AWESOME. 5 STARS ALL THE SAY...THANKS...ANYONE WHOM SAYS ITS LAME IS BECAUSE THIER INTO \"THE TODAY\" GAMES, BUT FAR FAR FROM LAME!

reviews.title: Brilliant game
reviews.comment: Absoluteley brilliant game it takes me back to my childhood when they were the first console games but now its in colour and on smartphones thank you I also miss rockstar ate my hamster if you could find a way to bring that game back that would be fantastic

reviews.author: Ember Wissenbach

reviews.title: Bad mechanics
reviews.comment: I was enjoying the game up until the game started allowing the computer to cheat by allowing the ball to pass through the borders on the side to where I could not block it and also making it to where the ball clearly passes throuh my bar when it should bounce off of it back at my opponent. I get that a computer player is challenging, but it shouldn\'t defy the game mechanics and cheat to win.
